snippet.title: Bomber Crew: American Edition inc. USAAF DLC - Official Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Get Bomber Crew on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/537800/Bomber_Crew/
Subscribe now for more news and updates: https://bit.ly/2AMyqSx

---

Take off has arrived! Runner Duck Games and Curve Digital are pleased to bring you the news that the second console DLC for award-nominated, Bomber Crew, is coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch on March 12th. The USAAF DLC arrives following its incredibly successful PC release last October and features a raft of new content to keep would-be Dambusters in the skies until at least tea time. Console players will also be able to purchase a bundle featuring the original Bomber Crew and the new DLC for a discounted price, as if they needed any more incentive.

With Bomber Crew: American Edition, console players will also be able to purchase a bundle featuring the original Bomber Crew and the new DLC for a discounted price, as if they needed any more incentive.
